com.dhemery.core
Interface Condition

All Superinterfaces:
org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
All Known Implementing Classes:
NamedCondition, PublishingCondition, SamplerCondition
public interface Condition
extends org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

A condition that may be satisfied or dissatisfied.

Method Summary
 void describeDissatisfactionTo(org.hamcrest.Description description)
          Describe this condition's most recent dissatisfaction.
 void describeTo(org.hamcrest.Description description)
          Describe the condition when satisfied.
 boolean isSatisfied()
          Evaluate whether the condition is satisfied.
 

Method Detail

isSatisfied

boolean isSatisfied()
Evaluate whether the condition is satisfied.

Note: Evaluating a condition may change its state.

Returns:
whether the condition is satisfied

describeTo

void describeTo(org.hamcrest.Description description)
Describe the condition when satisfied.

Note: This method should not change the condition's state.

Specified by:
describeTo in interface org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
Parameters:
description - the description to which to describe this condition

describeDissatisfactionTo

void describeDissatisfactionTo(org.hamcrest.Description description)
Describe this condition's most recent dissatisfaction. This method is meaningful only if the most recent isSatisfied() returned false.

Note: This method should not change the condition's state.

Parameters:
description - the description to which to describe the dissatisfaction
